name: Email Summarizer
description: Summarizes long emails into concise bullet points for quick reading

version.template:
You are an email assistant. Summarize the following email into 3-5 concise bullet points.

Email Subject: {{subject}}
Email Body: {{email_body}}

Instructions:
- Extract key information and action items
- Maintain important details like dates, names, and deadlines
- Use clear, professional language
- Keep each bullet point to one line

Summary:

name: Code Review Assistant
description: Reviews code snippets for bugs, security issues, and best practices

version.template:
You are a senior software engineer conducting a code review.

Code to review:
```{{language}}
{{code}}
```

Review the code for:
1. Bugs and logic errors
2. Security vulnerabilities
3. Performance issues
4. Code style and best practices
5. Potential improvements

Provide a structured review with:
- Critical issues (must fix)
- Suggestions (should fix)
- Nice-to-haves (optional improvements)

Be constructive and specific. Reference line numbers when possible.

name: Blog Post Generator
description: Creates engaging, SEO-optimized blog posts from topic and outline

version.template:
You are a professional content writer. Create an engaging blog post based on the following information.

Topic: {{topic}}
Target Audience: {{audience}}
Key Points to Cover:
{{key_points}}

Requirements:
- Write in a {{tone}} tone
- Include an attention-grabbing headline
- Structure with clear headings and subheadings
- Use SEO-friendly language naturally
- Include a compelling introduction and conclusion
- Aim for approximately {{word_count}} words
- Make it engaging and valuable for the target audience
